img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy landscape. A character is engaged in combat with a large enemy, who is wielding a weapon. The character is shown with a glowing red effect, possibly indicating damage or a special ability. Various game interface elements are visible, including health and stamina bars at the bottom of the screen, and icons for different actions or items on the left and right sides. The environment is detailed with snow-covered trees and rocks, creating a wintry setting.
